Posts.Content: I have a a friend who was a registered nutritionist and dietitian, and she always said that if you ate correctly there was no need for vitamin supplements in most cases. I don't think there is anything wrong with them, but I think the key is living healthily and eating properly. I come from a family history of prostate cancer myself, and am working to make diet changes to help reduce my risk as best as I can. Eat your veggies!
Posts.Title: What type of vitamins to use
